skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 1 turn.
skills.name: Crossup
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.desc: Removes all debuffs from this Champion and 1 random debuff from all allies, then heals this Champion by 100% of their MAX HP and heals all allies equal to 50% of the surplus heal. Afterwards, places a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on all allies for 2 turns, then grants this Champion an Extra Turn.
skills.name: Undying Fury

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Overpower
